Keep Cold. Serve Cool. Drink Fresh.
Unfiltered / Unfined
Vegan Friendly

items.name: Coldblooded
items.desc:
NOTE - Due to high demand, if collecting from the brewery, please do not come to collect until you receive an email to say it's ready.
Fresh Siren keg beer at home in awesome 5L mini kegs!
Welcome back Coldblooded, a brown porter designed to hit the spot when the weather turns. We cold-steep grains overnight before brewday to build up a gorgeous chocolately base before we even get started! From there expect roasty notes layered amongst subtle smoke, coffee and dark chocolate. Coldblooded pours silky smooth and drinks with a satisfying richness.
Keep Cold. Serve Cool. Drink Fresh.
Unfiltered / Unfined
Vegan Friendly
Mini kegs are stored refrigerated on site. Once received, keeps up to a recommended maximum of 10 days, drink within 3 days once opened. Drink soon, keep cold.

items.name: Elusive Brewing - Overflow
items.desc:
Guest beer from our neighbours at Elusive Brewing.
A three way collaboration between Elusive, Siren and Double-Barrelled for Brewgooder, this is a take on a classic German style. All Pilsner malt with Hallertau Blanc hops and fermented with an authentic Kölsch yeast strain, this clean and crisp lager has notes of gooseberry, elderflower and apple.

items.name: Futurist
items.desc: Futurist is a gluten free beer that packs a punch! Expect aromas of grapefruit, citrus, tropical fruits and pine along with subtle orange flavours. A hint of vanilla sweetness rounds out a soft, moreish mouthfeel.

items.name: Futurist
items.desc:
NOTE - Due to high demand, if collecting from the brewery, please do not come to collect until you receive an email to say it's ready.
Fresh Siren keg beer at home in awesome 5L mini kegs!
Futurist is a gluten free beer that packs a punch! Expect aromas of grapefruit, citrus, tropical fruits and pine along with subtle orange flavours. A hint of vanilla sweetness rounds out a soft, moreish mouthfeel.
Keep Cold. Serve Cool. Drink Fresh.
Unfiltered / Unfined
Vegan Friendly
Mini kegs are stored refrigerated on site. Once received, keeps up to a recommended maximum of 10 days, drink within 3 days once opened. Drink soon, keep cold.

items.name: Guava Script
items.desc: <SCRIPT> A welcome return for our favourite summer sour! Both Sean {our Head Brewer} and Erwin {of Van Moll fame} are big fans of pink guava, so this collaboration recipe almost coded itself! The beer is intensified with mango and passionfruit before being dry-hopped with Azacca and Mosaic. </SCRIPT>

items.name: Heart of Ice
items.desc: With some very rare tank space in the brewery, it would have been remiss of us not to take advantage with a beautifully matured lager. All Bavarian hops and carefully selected malt combine in this crystal clean, crisp beer. It's a drink to be savoured, finishing with a lightly hoppy flourish.

items.name: I Left My Wallet in El Dorado
items.desc: Our latest IPA is in an evolving line of recipes that we have dubbed 'Tasty IPAs' - no preconceptions about coasts, all focus on flavour. This easy drinking beer sees El Dorado take the lead with juicy stone fruit and tropical character. It's backed up by complementary dank, piney and citrus notes. You gotta get it.

items.name: Lumina
items.desc:
Lumina is our shining light, glowing with juicy tropical fruit notes. Hoppy aromas of mango and pineapple guide you towards explosive flavour, flashes of delicate citrus highlights and refreshing balanced bitterness. Our epiphany of a session beer drinks with a pillowy soft mouthfeel and pours with a beautiful light haze.
Keep Cold. Serve Cool. Drink Fresh.
Unfiltered / Unfined
Vegan Friendly / Gluten Free

items.name: Much Ado about Muffin
items.summary: Blueberry Muffin Pale Ale in collaboration with Lervig
items.desc: Nothing beats a fresh Blueberry Muffin. Except of course, a Blueberry Muffin beer! Our collaboration with Lervig is suitably bursting with juicy blueberries. A delicate vanilla sweetness is offset by hoppy citrus flavours and a subtle lemon undertone throughout, making this pale ale both indulgent and refreshing all at once.

items.name: On The Bubble
items.desc:
** Join us for a Live Youtube guided tasting on June 19th - 7.30pm **
Our quartet of Brut IPAs were team favourites last year, and with On The Bubble we aim to continue that trend. Sabro, Citra, Azacca and Chinook combine with distinct, clean tropical fruit notes layered upon a crisp base. The beer is spun on oak, bringing a touch of sweetness and a moreish dry finish.

items.name: Santo
items.desc:
NOTE - Due to high demand, if collecting from the brewery, please do not come to collect until you receive an email to say it's ready.
Fresh Siren keg beer at home in awesome 5L mini kegs!
Santo is a distinctly Siren lager. Our take on the style is full of American hops, working in harmony to offer subtle tropical fruit notes and bright citrus flavours. It pours with a delicate haze and a striking aroma. Saintly fresh, but devilishly drinkable.
Keep Cold. Serve Cool. Drink Fresh.
Unfiltered / Unfined
Vegan Friendly
Mini kegs are stored refrigerated on site. Once received, keeps up to a recommended maximum of 10 days, drink within 3 days once opened. Drink soon, keep cold.

items.name: Santo
items.desc: Santo is a distinctly Siren lager. Our take on the style is full of American hops, working in harmony to offer subtle tropical fruit notes and bright citrus flavours. It pours with a delicate haze and a striking aroma. Saintly fresh, but devilishly drinkable.

items.name: Sound Wave
items.desc:
Sound Wave carries her drinker to the west coast, to the golden shores of California where craft ale is nectar. She is the driest of Siren’s ales – full with flavour but subtle with bitterness.
A 5.6% west coast IPA: golden, immensely hoppy and alive with grapefruit, peach and mango flavours.

items.name: Soundwave
items.desc:
Welcome to tropical hop heaven. Soundwave is eminently drinkable, full of flavour and subtle with bitterness. Our most famous beer pours with an inviting haze, while big-hitting American hops deliver fruit notes in abundance and a trademark resinous finish.
Keep Cold. Serve Cool. Drink Fresh.
Unfiltered / Unfined
Vegan Friendly

items.name: Suspended In Cans
items.desc:
**Beer Ready To Ship From Monday**
A rare opportunity to drink one of our most popular beers at home! 'Suspended' is soft, hazy, juicy, packed full of hops and usually reserved for pints at your favourite pub. We mix up the hop profile of each batch, so check the gyle number on the bottom of the can to check what you're drinking: sirencraftbrew.com/Suspended
G1700 & G1701 - Suspended in Science - BRU-1 / Sabro / EkuanotG1728 - Suspended in Amarillo - Amarillo, Mandarina & AzaccaG1753 - Suspended in Citra - Citra, Centennial & Simcoe

items.name: Suspended in Cascade
items.desc:
NOTE - Due to high demand, if collecting from the brewery, please do not come to collect until you receive an email to say it's ready.
Fresh Siren keg beer at home in awesome 5L mini kegs!
Suspended in Cascade celebrates an American hop famed for it’s pleasant, flowery and citrus fruit qualities. On the nose those floral expectations shine through, with orange blossom and mango flesh. To taste, expect bitter and sweet orange with some tropical and berry like notes. This a beautifully clean brew with a great mouthfeel that will leave you feeling as refreshed as if you were stood under a waterfall.
Keep Cold. Serve Cool. Drink Fresh.
Unfiltered / Unfined
Vegan Friendly
Mini kegs are stored refrigerated on site. Once received, keeps up to a recommended maximum of 10 days, drink within 3 days once opened. Drink soon, keep cold.

items.name: Undercurrent
items.desc:
Undercurrent is part pale, part oats and part caramel barley. Her swirls of bold, bready and nutty malt whirl into a concoction of spicy, citrus, floral hops. Mystery lurks in those hops.
A 4.5% pale ale with spicy, grassy aromas and a taste of grapefruit and apricot.
(Not Vegan on Cask)

items.name: Yu Lu
items.desc: Yu Lu is an intricate beer with layers of flavour that remain distinctive, yet work in perfect harmony. Her name alludes to the mystical history of the humble tea leaf, which delivers subtle bergamot orange and lemon notes here, accentuated by the addition of lemon zest. Her delicate hop high notes will leave your taste buds sparkling. Allergens: Malted Barley, Wheat.

items.name: Yu Lu
items.desc:
NOTE - Due to high demand, if collecting from the brewery, please do not come to collect until you receive an email to say it's ready.
Fresh Siren keg beer at home in awesome 5L mini kegs!
Refreshing and exciting in equal measure, Yu Lu is brewed with Earl Grey tea and lemon zest for taste that belies its strength. Distinct peach and apricot notes are complemented by zesty bergamot flavours and a delicate loose leaf tea bitterness.
Keep Cold. Serve Cool. Drink Fresh.
Unfiltered / Unfined
Vegan Friendly

Bistre - Chocolate, Coconut and Pineapple | Claussenii & Sabro | Collaboration with Wilderness Brew
It takes 8 minutes and 20 seconds for the sunlight to travel the darkness of space and illuminate the Earth's surface. This beer embodies the contrast of light and dark: rich, dark roasty flavours of chocolate and coffee provide a backbone of Sabro hops to shine through giving elements of coconut and mango before a glimmer of pineapple from Claussenii yeast pokes through.
6 x 440ml can | ABV 4.5% | Contains Gluten

items.name: Charm

Orange and cardamom barrel-aged amber ale

items.name: Little Abacus
items.desc:
A light refreshing 2.8% micro-saison fermented in stainless steel and oak and hopped with Hull Melon
This summer, we bring you Little Abacus. Abacuses (Abaci?!) were used to perform all kinds of arithmetic that was too challenging to do in one’s head; such a simple device composed of beads on rods could be used to calculate all sorts of things, even square roots.
Little Abacus is a nod to simple innovations that change the world. As a beer, it boasts all the complexity of a grown-up saison in a small frame.
We too are having to innovate and change our approach considering the Covid-19 situation: the beer was destined for kegs to go up and down the country - instead, it will be going into 5-litre minikegs for all to enjoy at home in the sunshine. Stay home. Stay safe. Innovate.
1 x 5-litre mini keg | ABV 2.8% | Contains Gluten

items.name: Minimise
items.desc:
Fine Haze - Straw Colour Lemon, Hay & Bubblegum
Sometimes we want all the flavour, body and refreshment of a beer without all of the alcohol.
A table saison, comprising subtle spicy notes, full of rich rustic grain flavours and dry-hopped with traditional German hops is the perfect way of delivering this, all at a perfectly session-able ABV.
Minimising alcohol and maximising enjoyment.
6 x 330ml bottle | ABV 3.2% | Contains Gluten

items.name: Mutual Attraction
items.desc:
Vanilla and char, a hint of acidity and a beautiful bouquet of pineapple, lime zest and funk.
Barrels, Brettanomyces and Saison. Coulomb’s law describes the force of attraction between two charges. The mutual attraction between our virgin oak and ex-bourbon barrels, some wild yeast and our saison, Coulomb, was too great to keep them apart. Several months in the barrel has transformed this saison.
750ml bottle | ABV 6.4% | Contains Gluten

Tritium is a hydrogen-like substance, but much heavier due to two extra neutrons. A strong golden ale with a pilsner nucleus, rye and pink peppercorn spiciness, and a long finish due to its 7.5 % ABV, making it a much heavier affair.
6 x 330ml bottle | ABV 7.5% | Contains Gluten

Mini City of Gold is a highly sessionable version of our 5% milkshake IPA 'City Of Gold'. A creamy 3% base beer is charged with El Dorado and Azacca hops before being infused with vanilla. A beer full of flavour and low on alcohol, perfect for the summer.

items.name: Mixed 12 pack
items.desc:
Mixed 12 pack
Case contains 12x 440ml cans:
Black Sands - Imperial Stout with cinnamon and coconut - x1
10.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats - Vegitarian friendly
Blacks Sands is a pitch black Imperial Stout with cinnamon and coconut. It delivers initial flavours of cinnamon which then blends with the coconut, developing into a candied sweetness from the lactose and vanilla, with underlying notes of chocolate.
Maple Dream - Gluten-free, Lactose-free Maple Imperial Stout - x1
10.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats. Gluten free, tested bellow 20ppm - Vegan friendly
Maple Dream is a progression on the base ideas used in a previous gluten-free, lactose-free Imperial Sweet Stout that we brewed back in November 19, Leap. With some recipe adaptations and additions, this time we have created a Maple Imperial Stout which is still gluten-free and lactose-free, accessible to coeliacs, people with lactose and other gluten intolerance's, vegans and people who enjoy a good ol' Imperial Stout.
Raspberry Crash - Raspberry Imperial Stout - x1
10.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats - Vegan friendly
We do enjoy brewing fruited Imperial Stouts here at Wander Beyond. Raspberry Crash is a chewy Imperial Stout we re-fermented on 200g/L of raspberries before infusing it with vanilla and cacao nibs.
Flavours of rich chocolate and subtle roasted malt notes are combined with the ripeness from the raspberries to create this deviously delicious stout.
Mini City Of Gold - Table Beer - x1
3.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat, Lactose - Vegetarian friendly
Mini City of Gold is a highly sessionable version of our 5% milkshake IPA 'City Of Gold'. A creamy 3% base beer is charged with El Dorado and Azacca hops before being infused with vanilla. A beer full of flavour and low on alcohol, perfect for the summer.
Gasp - Milkshake IPA with Peach and Apricot - x1
7.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat, Lactose - Vegetarian friendly
The name Gasp is a nod back to a similar brew of ours that you may remember, Gulp.
Gasp is a deliciously fruited Milkshake IPA. Fermented on 200g/l of peaches and apricots. The sweetness from the fruits and lactose is balanced against a backdrop of citrus notes, provided by the Chinook dry hop. This is a refreshing yet moreish little number.
Octo-pie - Passionfruit Imperial Milkshake IPA - x1
9.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat, Lactose - Vegetarian friendly
Octo-pie is an Imperial passion fruit Milkshake IPA. Overloaded with half a tonne of tart and tangy passion fruit and infused with vanilla and creamy lactose, this is a refreshingly sharp yet indulgent dessert-like treat.
Sleepy Hollow - IPA - x4
7.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Wheat, Oats - Vegan friendly
For an IPA, Sleepy Hollow has a medium to thick body, which carries forward citrus flavours of sweet orange and pink grapefruit. These are backed up with tropical notes of mango and pineapple, with a slight dankness and a moderately bitter finish.
As for the artwork, the can pictures the hops Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe, climbing an enchanting boulder problem in the North Yorkshire Moors called 'Sleepy Hollow'. The picturesque boulder hides in the forest with a tree emerging from within it. The iconic line traverses a sloping block with big slaps and technical footwork (for those who climb, it's pretty tough and graded 7c+ from a sit).
Pursuit - Gluten-free, Lactose-free Imperial Milkshake IPA - x2
10.0% ABV - 440ml - Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat. Gluten free, tested bellow 20ppm - Vegan friendly
Pursuit is a gluten and lactose free version of one of our favourite beers to brew, Illicium. We believe we have successfully managed to create a doppelganger in Pursuit, which despite the lack of lactose still delivers on the sweet smoothness of it’s older sibling. Balanced with the punchy fruit flavours of the Citra and Mosaic hops to create a sweet dessert style Imperial Milkshake IPA, Pursuit is accessible to coeliacs, people with other gluten and lactose intolerance's and vegans.

items.summary: Imperial Stout with tonka, star anise, vanilla and cacao
items.desc:
Ozzy - Imperial Stout with tonka, star anise, vanilla and cacao
Ozzy pours pitch black with a tan head, giving off aromas of tonka beans and star anise. Upon your first mouthful you are met with big upfront hits of liquorice and aniseed, which then fades into notes of dark chocolate and vanilla. Ozzy has a smooth and soft level of carbonation which is accompanied on the way down by a hint of heat making sure you don’t forget it’s 11.0%. As you continue to drink Ozzy it becomes more and more morish.
11.0% ABV
440ml

items.name: All Together IPA
items.desc:
*ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON SUNDAY 14th JUNE WILL BE DESPATCHED ON MONDAY 15TH JUNE*
All Together is a project conceived and curated by Other Half Brewing NYC with the purpose of uniting independent breweries in helping to raise funds for hospitality industry professionals who have been affected by the Covid-19 lockdowns.
Each participating brewery was asked to brew a beer to a recipe released by Other Half and to donate a proportion of their choosing to a relevant cause. Our nominated charity is https://www.hospitalityaction.org.uk
Bold, glowing and full of fresh-ability this IPA is soft and deep with layer upon layer of blooming tropical madness. Charged up to busting point with lashings of MOSAIC, SIMCOE, CASCADE and CITRA giving off sleek dripping slices of ripe mango, crushed pineapple, over ripe peach and zesty grapefruit crush.
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Cycles Of Amplification IPA
items.desc:
*WE SHIP ONCE A WEEK - ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY ARE DESPATCHED ON A MONDAY*
A grandstand India Pale Ale of astral dimension. The silver cord is eternally severed disseminating dank riotous plumes of tropical thunder.
CITRA, MOSAIC and GALAXY lupulin commingle to fabricate a plump veneer of dripping mango, smashed papaya, bitter orange and smushed pineapple crush. A stratagem IPA for the Reptoid’s and Sheeple amongst us.
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Drones With Megaphones DDH Pale
items.desc:
*WE SHIP ONCE A WEEK - ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY ARE DESPATCHED ON A MONDAY*
The aeronautical faux eagle soars and warbles. It’s pestiferous humdrum whirs overhead observing your every move.
An intelligent, sophisticated, out of range mega pale forged from the finest 2 row low colour malted barley. A subtle yet tactical hop bill of IDAHO 7, BRU 1 and CHINOOK transport thumping melodious echos of peaches & cream, fleshy nectarine and fizzy lime with a crunchy biting crispy finish.
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Geordie Beer Geek
items.desc:
*WE SHIP ONCE A WEEK - ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY ARE DESPATCHED ON A MONDAY*
A Coffee Oatmeal Stout brewed in collaboration with Scandinavia’s OG brewing phantom MIKKELLER. This is the illegitimate son of the original BEER GEEK BREAKFAST STOUT. We took the original recipe, forced it apart then rebuilt it carefully with some WYLAM hoodoo. Layered swarthy malt complexity commingle with subtle pulsations of sweet honey and rare Columbian Nariño Aponte coffee beans.
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Heedhunter DDH Pale
items.desc:
*WE SHIP ONCE A WEEK - ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY ARE DESPATCHED ON A MONDAY*
By The River Brew Co’s trophy pale is now fresh in can for the first time ever!!!
Cushioned and lustrous on the chops with a Tzan-Tzas of hop unity to boot. CENTENNIAL, CITRA and MOSAIC spearhead the cull distributing fresh cuts of ripe Seville orange, mashed up mango and tangy pink grapefruit squeeze.
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Hickey The Rake
items.desc:
*WE SHIP ONCE A WEEK - ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY ARE DESPATCHED ON A MONDAY*
A Limonata Pale… An Ultra Pale which emulates almost toxic levels of citrus zing. A nuclear sherbet dib-dab of lemon, lime and tropical pineapple.
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Jakehead IPA
items.desc:
*WE SHIP ONCE A WEEK - ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY ARE DESPATCHED ON A MONDAY*
Supercharged India Pale Ale.... Rich/bright & amber/bronze with lots of American hop aroma. Distinctly bittersweet on the palate with a massive hop complexity fashioned deep within the IPA tradition.
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: My Garden Of Forking Paths
items.desc:
*WE SHIP ONCE A WEEK - ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY ARE DESPATCHED ON A MONDAY*
A mixed culture farmhouse ale of rustic proportion. Deep flaxen and soft with oats on body. Multiple barrel cultures blended with 2 Belgian Saison strains divert your senses beyond the orchard gate where ripeness lives. Musky peach flesh, sappy pear, spicy wheat and dried orange zest intermingle in harmony as the late summer sun slowly wanes away afar and yonder...
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Reflections In The Present
items.desc:
*WE SHIP ONCE A WEEK - ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY ARE DESPATCHED ON A MONDAY*
Starting with an undecorated grist of extra pale base malt, oats and wheat flakes producing an uncomplicated structure for a complex build.
A free rise fermentation using a classic farmhouse saison strain is then blended with 3 separate wild barrel fruit cultures. A 5 month fermentation / maturation period leaves us with a spritzed up funky midsummer smasher.
Blooming with crisp, clean cider barrel esters followed by a compounded admixture of acidic fresh orchard fruits.
Crab apple, white grape, peach flesh and tart lime zest intermingle with aseptic farmyard tannins resulting in a crisp and bracing sunshine quencher.
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Summon Up The Blood
items.desc:
*WE SHIP ONCE A WEEK - ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY ARE DESPATCHED ON A MONDAY*
JUST RELEASED!! IF YOU WANT BLOOD... YOU GOT IT!!
The long awaited release of our limited edition BBA HEAVEN HILL EDITION of SUMMON UP THE BLOOD. A Coconut and Vanilla Bean Imperial Stout brewed in July 2019 with the infamous OLD CHIMNEYS then aged for 8 month in freshly emptied HEAVEN HILL straight Kentucky Bourbon barrel. Weighing in at 13.5% sharing is caring.
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: The Cold Condition
items.desc:
*WE SHIP ONCE A WEEK - ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY ARE DESPATCHED ON A MONDAY*
LAGERBIER... This lager has been cold conditioned for 12 weeks at 0°C. Using extra pale Pilsner, carapils and acidulated malt with a kettle addition of Lemon Drop and Hallatau Blanc. Light, clean and crisp with mellow notes of lemongrass, gooseberry and white grapes.
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Wylam Gold
items.desc:
*ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON SUNDAY 14th JUNE WILL BE DESPATCHED ON MONDAY 15TH JUNE*
THIS BEER IS FOR LOVERS OF CASK BEER... DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU ARE ONLY A FAN OF OUR HOP FORWARD BEERS!!!
So it took 20 years and a Global Pandemic to make this happen but FINALLY you can now enjoy Wylam Gold in a can! It's tough to get hold of a cask style beer in these unprecedented times and we know many of you love a good sessionable Golden Ale. So this is for you.
Brewed with all gold ingredients - Golden Promise Pale Malt, Golden Naked Oats, First Gold Hops, with a Willamette hop finish. Fresh, clean flavour with a hint of grapefruit citrus from the Willamette. A light spunding adds a gentle carbonation that helps carry it in the can
Unfined pours with a slight haze
Ⓥ Vegan Friendly
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
